name: Dwelling
description:
You are some cloud doggo and you see this fruit. After falling, you need to figure a way back up to the clouds. You can either give or take to do so.

Controls:

  • [Arrow Keys and Space] to Move and Jump
  • [X] to Take (eat the plants)
  • [C] to Give (cry to grow the plants)

Xbox Controller support (not sure if works with other controllers):

  • [Analog Stick] for movement
  • [X] or [Y] to jump
  • [A] to take
  • [B] to give
Ludum Dare Page
